To clarify myself... about what I didnt like about the game.. I felt like it was a very boring and bland game with less than standard graphics, and below average gameplay. To me, the game has no replayability... therefore hence, no shadowman 2. But you judge for yourself. I bought this game originally for PSX, for $.99 at a factory closeout store here in the U.S. called surplus city. I thought WOW!! WHATA BARGAIN! Until I played the friggin thing. Anyway get it, play it, and judge for yourself. I have played alot of bad games... in fact I have nearly 3000 games total. However shadowman is not among them.
